arts.ttl: Player ratings - Wigan Athletic v Shrewsbury Town - 'Quietly goes about his business while being one of the central cogs in the side'...Paul Kendrick's ratings
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that were held to a 2-2 draw by rock-bottom Shrewsbury Town at the Brick Community Stadium and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: 'Gutted' Wigan Athletic boss pinpoints reason for collapse
arts.sum: A 'gutted' Shaun Maloney admitted Wigan Athletic were architects of their own downfall after throwing away a two-goal lead to drop two points against rock-bottom Shrewsbury Town.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Wigan Athletic 2 Shrewsbury Town 2: Dale double in vain as Tics press self-destruct button
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic failed to take advantage of a two-goal lead courtesy of a Dale Taylor brace as struggling Shrewsbury Town responded twice in the final quarter to steal a point.

arts.ttl: George Lloyd strikes late on to salvage Shrewsbury a draw at Wigan
arts.sum: The hosts were cruising 2-0 up with only 23 minutes remaining.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Who makes our expected team v Shrewsbury Town?
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Shrewsbury Town at the Brick Community Stadium this weekend.

arts.ttl: Wigan v Shrewsbury Town: Salop looking for early festive cheer
arts.sum: There are winners in the group, but I just need them to come out now and start really believing that we can go to places like Wigan and get a result." Since Ainsworth has come in as boss his side have conceded 12 goals in four games - and in the run-up to the match against Shaun Maloney's team, he says they have dedicated time to fixing that.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic man wanted by National League side
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic striker Josh Stones is attracting interest ahead of the January transfer window, according to journalist Peteâ€¦ The post Wigan Athletic man wanted by National League side appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wigan Athletic vs. Shrewsbury Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Wigan Athletic and Shrewsbury Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief's one-word verdict as he prepares to bring up a century
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney celebrates 100 games in charge of Wigan Athletic this weekend and has one word to describe his tenure.

arts.ttl: Massive boost for Wigan Athletic and Liverpool with early Luke Chambers Christmas present!
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have been given the perfect early Christmas present with news on-loan Liverpool defender Luke Chambers will be back from injury months earlier than initially feared.
